summary:
As the name suggests this mod will allow you to make any child from game as your
follower.

They will not take your followers slot so your are free to recruit any new 
follower.

They can do all things that vanilla followers can do.

After dismissing they will return to there home.
descriptionHtml:
Description
==============

As the name suggests this mod will allow you to make any child from game as your
follower.

They will not take your followers slot so your are free to recruit any new 
follower.

They can do all things that vanilla followers can do.

After dismissing they will return to their home.

Change log
============
Updated to version 2
Children can now actually fight for you.
Added Seq file to prevent dialogue bug.

Compatibility
============
fully Compatible with Hearthfire dlc
Compatible with custom child mods.

Installation
===========
Remove any older version if you have earlier 
Extract new file via a NMM or manually in your skyrim folder, overwrite any file if asked.
Make sure Child Follower 2 esp is checked.
author: Praveen
